news_header: One Direction members release statement on Liam Payne's death.
news_text: Liam Payne, a member of One Direction, passed away after falling from a balcony in Buenos Aires. The remaining band members, Louis Tomlinson, Zayn Malik, Niall Horan, and Harry Styles, expressed their need for time to mourn and cherish the memories they shared with him. One Direction is recognized as one of the most successful boy bands, having sold over 70 million records globally.
